text: Melting Method Break the chocolate into all possible pieces (not by smashing it, just into squares).  Put chocolate squares into a small microwavable bowl. Cover with a napkin to prevent splattering. Microwave for 30 seconds through 1 minute.  Enjoy your melted chocolate by getting a small spoon and watching a movie or TV.  Eating Method Open the wrapping on a  bar and eat it slowly.  Enjoy every piece of the chocolate. Even eat the crumbs! (if you feel so inclined) Share, if desired.  Milkshake Method Break the chocolate into small pieces.  Mix milk and ice cream (flavor of your choice) in a cup.  Slowly mix in bits of chocolate. Add some chocolate syrup if you like. Be sure to pour the milkshake into a cup not in a cone.Milkshake cones can be very messy.  Enjoy your milkshake!  Melting Chocolate Consider purchasing special melting chocolate.  Heat up water in a double boiler pot.  Break up chocolate and slowly add to pot.  Observe melting, stirring occasionally.  Dip strawberries, pretzels, cookies, peanut butter crackers, etc. into the chocolate. Tongs may be helpful. Allow items to cool on wax paper, especially if you wish to save them store them in the refrigerator.
